1.0.1.name: wordpress/work-from-home-projects
1.0.1.description: Easily integrate a work-from-home widget on your site and start offering your visitors a constant stream of work-from-home jobs, gathered from all across the web. The widget displays projects that are related to your visitors' skills and interests. The widget can be completely customized to enhance your site's design.
